speech: Hi there, my name is Achelois. You can think of me as your companion and talk to me freely. Tell me your name?
Hi there, my name is Achelois. You can share your feelings with me. You know my name, how about your name?

Hi there, my name is Achelois. You can share your feelings with me. This is strictly between us ;)
What do you want me to call you?

您好，我的名字是Achelois。你可以和我分享你的感受。这完全在我们之间;）
你想让我给你打电话什么？
您好，我的名字是Achelois。你可以把我当作你的伴侣，随意与我交谈。告诉我你的名字？
